snippet: Novak Djokovic, Andy Murray and Rafael Nadal made their way into the Madrid Open quarterfinals on Thursday, each with straight-set wins....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic, Andy Murray and Rafael Nadal made their way into the Madrid Open quarterfinals on Thursday, each with straight-set wins.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic, Murray, Nadal Advance to Madrid Open Quarterfinals
headline.main: Djokovic, Murray, Nadal Advance to Madrid Open Quarterfinals
